Fortune Telling Case

Selling a slatted blue wooden case. TAP to get fortunes.

>l case Nestled within the slot of the blue wooden case is a series of wooden slats, each one crafted of a different type of wood and engraved with a painted symbol.

You tap upon your blue wooden case three times before turning the case over with the slot down. A single slat of wood peeks out of the case and falls out.

A golden linden wood slat engraved with the image of a white eagle clatters to the ground.

You quickly pick up the slat and place it back inside your case.

Check out the GSWiki page for slat translation information.

MB: 500k CB: SOLD on BO
